$schema.description: Reference to the JSON schema definition.

includeSensitiveInformation.description: Determines whether to include sensitive information (such as authentication headers, and cookies) in the generated HAR file. When set to false, sensitive information will be redacted. Default: false.

includeResponse.description: Determines whether to include HTTP response body in the generated HAR file. When set to false, only request information will be included. Default: false.
